attributes.action: Reciprocal social security agreement countries to include South Africa to assist self employed British abroad (limited by
attributes.additional_details: To be based on former UK state benefit known as Family Credit for self employed people, allowed up to six months abroad.  This will be a big help to those of us who are construction subcontrators working in South Africa, inbetween contracts.  Reciprocal social security agreement countries to include South Africa to assist self employed British working abroad (limited by
